about_the_game:
(Mathmaria helps you practice addition and subtraction in the range 1 - 100.)

In Mathmaria you play the wizard Abakus, who is tasked with freeing the land of Mathmaria from the dark kings Adolar and Subtrikus, who have forbidden contact between the two kingdoms.



To do this, you explore the world and free the residents and cities from the fighters of the two kingdoms using the power of mathematics!



Help the residents of Mathmaria repair their world by gathering resources and crafting materials to make the necessary repairs.



I hope you enjoy your journey through Mathmaria.

More about the game:

- Explore the world of Mathmaria and learn addition and subtraction in the range 1-100
Playing through it several times increases the maximum value by 100, making the game also suitable for advanced players.
- Visit and help the residents of Subtralia and Adolar
- Explore the world and find secrets that unlock more mini-games in the game.
- Solve puzzles using mathematics to explore all corners of Mathmaria.
